title: Geweldig Superdeluxe Hotel
text: Dit hotel is zeer gunstig gelegen, vlakbij een hele leuke night market en ook niet ver van de gezellige 101 Tower buurt.Als je dit hotel boekt neem dan de Horizon optie, dat biedt vele voordelen zoals gratis ontbijt, gratis drankjes, inclusief mooie wijnen en cocktails van 17.30 tot 19.30. Ook zit hierbij een late check out tot 16.00Het personeel is zeer vriendelijk, en op de 43e verdieping bevindt zich een verwarmd zwembad met geweldig uitzicht.Ik zal hier volgende keer zeker weer verblijven!

title: Simply a lovely place to stay
text: It is becoming my favorite place to stay whenever I am in town. The staff performance was second to none.

title: Great service
text: Excellent service. This is becoming my place to stay whenever I am in town.

title: Great location
text: Great place to stay in Taipei. Can't say enough about it's excellent staff service.

title: Comfortable & nice hotel
text: This is the 2nd time i go back to this hotel in 1 month. Location is good to me not in the heart of the city but nearby that is nice to me. staff are very friendly & welcoming. Will be back to this hotel when i go back to taiwan.

title: Hmmmm.... Good , Ok... But no washlet on toilet (
text: I upgrade to an executive room.I thought that it's Well complete and comfortable if I upgrade to an executive room. The room was big, clean but only on there toilet that have no washlet or bide wash. I request a small bowl or tabo in Tagalog. They gave Me a hahaha ğŸ˜sandok. Later, they gave me a small bowl or tabo.  Well ,,, it's Ok. But I suggest to install a washlet or bide wash to the executive room.  Because ... That is one point important for the Guest. The staff of the hotel are attentive and friendly. The pool... Ok. Very good. The food also... Ok. Delicious. Only the staff of the restaurant are not attentive or not active.  They not told us the buffet breakfast must be closed in a few mins. And I invite my brother in law to eat together a breakfast in this hotel. I'm so ashamed because I told to my brother in law it's a buffet ... We go there 9:15 am.

title: Great Location.
text: Great location based on where I needed to be in the city. The staff performance was wonderful. The only negative I could think of was probably the food selection at the Cafe on 36th floor. It was fairly limited. Obviously, you were there for the view of the city.

title: 5 Nights in Taipei
text: We stayed 5 nights at the Shangri-La in the Da'an neighbourhood in Taipei. The hotel upgraded us to a large room with an amazing view of Taipei 101. The Da'an neighbourhood is a great location with easy access to all the major sights.

text: New equipment & facilities in roomRoom is big enough

title: A good hotel
text: We stayed there for almost a week. My 4 year old enjoyed the swimming pool & breakfast. It is within walking distance to local night market & some supermarket as well. 10 mins walking to the nearest MRT station. But unfortunately, my husband has a dust allergic when we stayed there. We can see the dust flying all over the room (I do not know it is because of the fabric they use for their bedcover or the room is just not very clean). Hopefully, they can look into this.

title: Still one of the best in Taipei after all these years
text: Despite new five star international hotels springing up in Taipei in recent years after many years of zero development, Shangri-La in Taipei is still one of the best.  Central, good location yet not too noisy and busy.Great service.  The Chinese restaurant made room for us in another restaurant to have Chinese food eventhough theirs was full.

title: è¶…æ£’
text: Handy location and friendly staff. Horizon Club provided excellent and efficient services for customers traveling for business.

title: Fantastic hotel
text: This hotel has a fantastic roof top swimming pool on 41floor. you can watch taipei 101 building at top side and enjoy great time with your family or friends. Employees of this hotel are very good English speaker and you can communicate with them. This hotel is located in main area of Taipei city. so you can reach easily many attractive places. If you are lucky, you are able to watch taipei 101 building in your room even though there is foggy day.

title: Truly lives up to expectations
text: Except for its being a little far from a MRT station, Shangri-La Eastern Plaza hotel offers a true Shangri-la for travellers: spacious and luxurious room with quality amenities, professional and efficient yet warm and friendly staff as well as beautiful lounge on the 38th floor.

text: Everything was perfect! I would definitely return.

text: Good view, warm services and good room arrangement

title: Nice rooms. Well laid out and spacious.
text: Staff were good and helpful, easy to get cabs. Coffee shop closes at 8pm turn into a bar. Nice cafes nearby for breakfast serving good pastries and coffee. Not near anything of interest but cabs easily available.

title: One of the top class Shangrila's properties
fantastoc stay at shangri-la  taipei
text: awesome.  food was great, service?- they new my family by name on the 2nd day!  Shangrila lives up to its word on premier service.  rooms were so clean and so quiet you could hear a pin drop.

title: Good staff, clean. Very close to mall
Lovely swimming pool
text: Stayed 2nights. quite far from tube stations near the hotel, probably takes 20mins on foot. Very friendly and kind staff and reception. Whats more, safety gurards at swimming pool is also so helpful. Would love to visit here again

title: Quite well-satisfied service, comparatively good price.
text: I like every thing about this hotel. I like most its bath room. My room was upgraded and the bathroom was big and has breath-taking the view of the center of Taipei. Room was cleaned twice a day.

title: Great location
text: It's at the nicer part of taipei, where is modern and clean. Its within walking distance to shopping anf taxi to most destination is at reasonable price.

title: It's the Shangri-la, what do you expect
text: The hotel overall was great. But there were some points I hope they would consider. The fragrance they spray in the lobby is extremely overpowering. It's like being punched in the face with incense every time you walk through the entrance. I had to hold my breath every time I walked in.

title: I was a victim of "upsell" my stay was over my budget.
text: Service very good, Monica in Horizon Club took an extra interest in our visit and was very helpful.

title: STAFF IS SUPERB!
text: I would like to praise the staff by the name of Louis. I was well greeted at the front desk upon my arrival, it was my birthday and he arranged a surprise cake in my room. I was overwhelmed and greatly appreciate of the service and effort! I'll definitely visit again!!

title: Great rooftop pool
text: Good location and great rooftop pool for this extreme heat at this time of the year.

title: Staff  phoned me around 2:45 pm daily for 6 days .
text: I put on Do Not Disturb sign until I left my room daily around 4:00pm . Staff called me daily at 2:45pm to ask me whether I need a room-make-up or not . This is very disturbing and unnecessary.

title: excellence
text: very comfy and nice services and staff

title: Outstanding experience
text: My stay was a pleasant experience, from the checkin to the checkout. It is a 5 star service

title: Another great stay
text: Simply love this place! The performance of the staff was simply amazing. Will continue to stay here whenever I am in town.

title: Excellent place to stay
text: It simply was wonderful. I just can't say enough about it's excellent staff performance.
